mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, REFER_DATE AS referDate, REFER_STATEMENT_NO AS referStatementNo, REFER_START_TIME AS referStartTime, REFER_END_TIME AS referEndTime, DEAL_SEQ_NO AS dealSeqNo, DEAL_TIME AS dealTime, PROCESS_STATUS AS processStatus, LOCATE_GUBUN AS locateGubun, DEAL_METHOD AS dealMethod, DEPOSIT_BANK_CODE AS depositBankCode, DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT_NO AS depositAccountNo, WITHDRAW_BANK_CODE AS withdrawBankCode, WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT_NO AS withdrawAccountNo, DEAL_AMT AS dealAmt FROM ATMS_03001120

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, REFER_DATE AS referDate, REFER_STATEMENT_NO AS referStatementNo, REFER_START_TIME AS referStartTime, REFER_END_TIME AS referEndTime, DEAL_SEQ_NO AS dealSeqNo, DEAL_TIME AS dealTime, PROCESS_STATUS AS processStatus, LOCATE_GUBUN AS locateGubun, DEAL_METHOD AS dealMethod, DEPOSIT_BANK_CODE AS depositBankCode, DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT_NO AS depositAccountNo, WITHDRAW_BANK_CODE AS withdrawBankCode, WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT_NO AS withdrawAccountNo, DEAL_AMT AS dealAmt FROM ATMS_03001120 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, REFER_DATE = #{referDate}, REFER_STATEMENT_NO = #{referStatementNo}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_03001120 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, REFER_DATE = #{referDate}, REFER_STATEMENT_NO = #{referStatementNo}

UPDATE ATMS_03001120 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, REFER_START_TIME = #{referStartTime}, REFER_END_TIME = #{referEndTime}, DEAL_SEQ_NO = #{dealSeqNo}, DEAL_TIME = #{dealTime}, PROCESS_STATUS = #{processStatus}, LOCATE_GUBUN = #{locateGubun}, DEAL_METHOD = #{dealMethod}, DEPOSIT_BANK_CODE = #{depositBankCode}, DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT_NO = #{depositAccountNo}, WITHDRAW_BANK_CODE = #{withdrawBankCode}, WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT_NO = #{withdrawAccountNo}, DEAL_AMT = #{dealAmt} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, REFER_DATE = #{referDate}, REFER_STATEMENT_NO = #{referStatementNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_03001120 ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, REFER_DATE, REFER_STATEMENT_NO, REFER_START_TIME, REFER_END_TIME, DEAL_SEQ_NO, DEAL_TIME, PROCESS_STATUS, LOCATE_GUBUN, DEAL_METHOD, DEPOSIT_BANK_CODE, DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT_NO, WITHDRAW_BANK_CODE, WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT_NO, DEAL_AMT ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{referDate}, #{referStatementNo}, #{referStartTime}, #{referEndTime}, #{dealSeqNo}, #{dealTime}, #{processStatus}, #{locateGubun}, #{dealMethod}, #{depositBankCode}, #{depositAccountNo}, #{withdrawBankCode}, #{withdrawAccountNo}, #{dealAmt} )
